metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17960 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
CKEditor 4.x before 4.11.0 allows user-assisted XSS involving a source-modepaste.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ckeditor - 4.11.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.1+dfsg-1').
